New Records: Glenn Phillips scored a century (104 runs from 64 balls) in New Zealand's victory over Sri Lanka in the T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: Glenn Phillips was substituted due to cramps during Sri Lanka's innings
New Zealand won the match by 65 runs
Glenn Phillips became the second centurion of the tournament after hitting 10 fours and four sixes
Miscellaneous Highlights: New Zealand solidified their lead at the top of group one with this win
The match was played at the SCG (Sydney Cricket Ground)
Every team in group one has two games remaining in the tournament
